name: Crawler (itch) (whitedr1, godtierladybug)
description:
Crawler is a 2D adventure-battler where you play as a bug hired to defeat the hostile bugs in the brain that cause the thoughts that bring us all down. Use your words to clean up a messy-mind and leave the brain feeling clear-headed.

Created for the March MSU Spartasoft Game Jam. Team Ziti!

Credits

Programming, Battler Design - Drew White

Art, Level Design - Zoe Naylor

Used Assets

All sounds from freeSound.org. All other assets were created by us. List includes:

  • Pen Click - andersmmg
  • Weird Song Thing - Seth_Makes_Sound
  • Big Band Music - Bertsz
  • Water drips in the cave HQ - tosha73
  • squishy_flesh_thingy_seamless - 1urker
